label: Apple___Apple_scab
description: Apple scab affects apple crops and may lead to reduced yield if untreated.
symptoms: Typical symptoms of apple scab include discoloration, spots, or deformities on leaves or fruits.
cause: The primary cause of apple scab is microbial infection (fungi, bacteria, or viruses).
solution: Apply recommended fungicides/pesticides and remove infected plant material.
prevention: Practice crop rotation, proper spacing, and maintain clean growing conditions.
